title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: When the data set editor is opened, the schema is queried and the entire list of tables and columns are loaded, causing a delay. As a result, the message 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed.
EB: The load of the tree should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This would improve the user experience and avoid the delay caused by querying the entire schema.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the data set editor.
2. Observe the delay while the entire schema is queried and the 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' message is displayed.

Note: Bug 101372 requests the ability to filter based on schema, which can be considered as an additional feature request.
